title: [1.12.2-1.9][Sky Resource 2——天空资源2]别样的空岛生存科技
author: 零尘233
txt_content:
本帖最后由 零尘233 于 2020-1-5 19:54 编辑 

Sky Resource Classic天空资源2


前言时隔一年,说好的弃坑的模组竟然更新了
介绍本模组是以一种别于无中生有形式获取科技空岛初期的模组
与天空资源:经典的不同之处拥有更多的炼金仪器 氧化加热器具有框架 相比天空资源经典内容更多
图片模組GUI


生命注入装置


氧化加热器

搬运授权基于GNU协议 无须请求作者授权

相关模组及联动
void island control
天空资源:经典
以及相对于工业 林业 AE的联动

mod下载本帖不提供百度云下载
请自行到原帖下载
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/sky-resources
汉化该版本已经包含了所有汉化
本帖更新历史1.2018.08.27日正式发帖2.2018.08.31修复格式增加汉化更新部分3.2018.10.04部分更改汉化更新部分（还是不完善） 增加本帖更新日志4.2019.8.11优化排版 更新模组最新版本
模组更新历史（我搬运的版本开始）2.3.9修复核模组的相关物品和功能的支持
增加原版坩埚的兼容性
修复carfttweaker修改催化剂合成导致错误的问题
修复相对于燃烧控制器的一个bug
2.3.8.修复氧化加热器将合成以外的物品落在外部
搬运声明原搬运贴
由于一搬贴进了回收站 根据
【6-2】允许「二次搬运」的情况：
「更新接力」Mod的MC版本更新或重大内容更新/旧帖质量过差(可私信版主咨询)
—— 基本原则：务实，如更新原帖内容意义甚小，亦可联系版主代为编辑该Mod支持的版本号等简要信息，勿做无用功及引发无益纠纷；
—— 接力方式：确有必要接力时，需在现有转载帖内回帖提出请求，并在其中明确说明本项规则，自通知之时起一周内楼主无任何回应或回复已放弃更新，则视为请求通过；
—— 确认效力：为确认现有转载帖作者确实收到通知、避免恶意编辑回帖内容以伪造二搬证明，故通知回帖一经编辑即认定为失效，如有必要请再次回帖；
—— 拒绝的权利：更新通知及接力过程中态度应文明友善、将心比心，若因此发生纠纷，现有转载帖作者提交证据经版主确认后有权拒绝该二搬者的要求；
—— 留下证明：请在新帖内显著注明现有转载帖地址及相关弃更截图证明(可使用「spoiler」代码将其折叠)；
—— 特殊情况：若现有转载帖楼主账号≥30天未登录/已注明不再更新，则接力请求可免，但新帖内仍需注明上述内容。
「其他情况」站内已有的搬运帖位于 Mod回收区 或 已被永久关闭，此时可直接发布新搬运帖，无需回帖请求及张贴证明。
可以进行二搬
推广如果你想推广这款模组的话 你可以把这段代码写入你的签名档
[url=https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-817623-1-1.html][img=320,64]https://upload.cc/i1/2019/08/18/e1HpdO.png[/img][/url]复制代码效果

原排版
  ——————————————————————————————————————
mod介绍
本模组是由curseforge上的Bartz24大大所制作的一款空岛科技生存的模组,类似于无中生有mod以获取空岛科技物资为主
下面是作者对自己的mod的介绍The mod where all materials come from alchemy and technology in the sky.
搭配void island control  mod食用更佳
——————————————————————————————————————图片介绍
·模组教程GUI界面·生命注入装置·冰箱·木质氧化器·吸水器 ·生产岩浆的烈焰块·生产矿物的冷凝器·加热器
——————————————————————————————————————更新日志:
2.3.8Fixed excess during combustion being dropped outside... 
2.3.7Hotfix to be compatible with Void Island Control 1.4+
2.3.6Show expected remaining output for condenserFixed the amazing "crystal fluid not going away when replacing the condenser" bug!
Improved/fixed JEI stuff
Freezer progress doesn't look weird anymore

2.3.5Fixed the crushed stone texture
2.3.4Fixed redstone detection issues
2.3.3Added config options to disable mod plugins support
2.3.2
Added the muffler trait to certain casings
Fixed crucible fluid rendering
Made fuel tooltips clearer to read
Fixed fusion table shift clicking
Fixed spawning of items in combustion chamber (Probably does not fix interaction with sponge...this fix is not for that)

2.3.1Hopefully improved performance of machines (may cause issues at first)Fixed input items being allowed to be extracted by hoppers/pipesChanged cobalt alchemical dust recipe to avoid conflictsUpdated chinese localization
2.3.0
Finally changed all RF displays from FE->RFAdded chorus recipes for life infusionAdded alchemical glass (used for lots of crystal shards)Removed the advanced recipes config
Lowered cost of prismarine crystals
Changed rates for crushed stone and dirty gems from rock grinder
Changed rock crusher multiplier from x3->x1.2 to match new rates
Changed cost of ores from condenser to be higher
Updated zh_CN.lang thanks to SihenZhang on github!



2.2.3-HotfixFixed movement mechanics of players/item/etc in crystal fluid
2.2.2Increased rarity of osmium (Remember to update config)Improved quick dropper to drop in non solid blocks. No longer requires an air blockFixed crystal fluid fishingRemoved some code for crystal fluid bucket handling to help avoid future issues
2.2.1-HotfixAdded 1 more soul sand to magma island (doable now without micromanaging)Added cutting knife recipes for logs to planks to sticks
2.2.0Added a special Void Island Control island: the Magma Island (DIFFICULT START)Added magmafied stone and petrified wood Added osmium and refined obsidian casings/condensers/combustion heaters/heat providers Added HU/tick to the combustion GUIAdded config to prioritize mods materials in condensers/caludrons/etc Improved manyullyn casings/condensers/combustion heaters/heat providers (Requires a couple config changes!)Fixed bucket/fluid container issues with the crucibleFixed RF powered combustion heaters and heat providersFixed alchemical fusion table GUIFixed dupe bug when being killed while doing life infusion
2.1.5-Hotfix
Fixed crash on server startup
2.1.4-Hotfix
Fixed fuel issue in combustion heaters and heat providerEnd portal now works in all dimensionsImproved the smart combustion controller guide
2.1.3
Fuel values and stats have been redone! This will affect combustion heaters and heat providers!Added dump buttons to the condensers and fusion tableFixed knife crafttweaker recipesAdded Pam's Harvestcraft veggie/fruit/grain to plant matter recipesReverted spruce sapling to 1 recipe (was separated for normal dirt and coarse dirt due to forge bug)
2.1.2
Fixed crash when some mods aren't loadedFixed crash when there is uranium ingot but no oreFixed rock grinder/knife desyncAdded zh_CN lang. Thank SihenZhang!
2.1.1-Hotfix
Fixed Combustion Controller crash (at least 1 crash)Removed console spam from water extractorChanged cauldron cleaning rates againImproved combustion controller guide
2.1.0
Completely new Config FILE. You need to reconfigure them!
Added a bunch of new config options
Added the smart combustion controller
Added light matter (item, machines, etc)
Added light matter freezer
Added Extra Bees support (rocky, marble, nether, water bees in the bee attractor)
Added Illagers to the dark matter warper
Added improved end portal
Added wildlife attractor
Added Rock Candy mod support
Added tip of trapdoors to guide
Added condenser crafttweaker support
Added uranium, yellorium, and thorium alchemical dusts
Added new knife "crafting" system
Readded IC2 mod support Fixed plant matter/enriched bonemeal issues
Fixed fluid dropper issues
Fixed quartus dust recipe
Fixed osmium alchemical dust recipe
Fixed link in guide to crafttweaker support wiki
Fixed iron freezer model
Fixed Water and lava from blaze powder block/water extractor flowing
Fixed crucible with non-vanilla fluid containers
Fixed water extractor targetting
Fixed life injector working with entities that don't die
Fixed shapeless recipes
Changed Fusion Table to output items as it processes, and not all at once now
Changed Survivalist fishing rod to be unbreakable
Changed condenser yield/speed
Improved quartus dust yield percent
Improved rock cleaner/crusher
Improved magma block heat source
Improved JEI display for some things
Improved Water Extractor to act as a fluid tank
Improved Condenser to stack outputs
Improved rate for crushed stone in cauldron cleaning

2.0.23Fixed some fusion recipes
2.0.22-Balanced all the thingsChanged/added some recipehsChanged some machine statsChanged some heat values Removed console spam
2.0.21Hotfix for crash with bee attractor
2.0.20Hotfix for crash on startup
2.0.19 (Version for fixes/balance changes before 2.1.0)Fixed fusion table sometimes not consuming the inputsIn-game guide now shows your selected page when opening the guideFixed bee attractor crashChanged nether wart, cactus, and radioactive powder mixture recipesChanged casing recipes to avoid more recipe conflictsAdded carrots and potatoes to grass dropsOther guide changesFixed heat provider fuel issuesAdded check for possible iron freezer crash
2.0.18Fixed condensers and combustion heaters losing their itemsFixed typos in guideRemoved console spam
2.0.17Added Tinkers Construct support!Fixed Iron Freezer model againFixed typo in guide
2.0.16Fixed issue when loading casing blocks into the world
2.0.15Bee Attractor has been improved and fixed
2.0.14Fixed recipe conflict between cobalt dust and alchemical gold ingot
2.0.13Fixed crucible speed not scaling correctly
2.0.12Fixed dark matter warperFixed pipe connections to the casing and rf/fluid/itemsFluid dropper pulls from multiple tanks at 1 time
2.0.11Fixed mod dependency cycleFixed iron freezer automatic input
2.0.10Added CraftTweaker supportHopefully fixed client desyncs
2.0.9Fixed draconic evolution guide pageBetter bonemeal items are now instant
Crushed stone gives less dusts
Rock Cleaner/Crusher respond to redstone signal

2.0.8
Fixed draconium resources
Fixed iron freezer TOP support
Lowered Magma Crucible recipe times to match heat providers better
Changed dark matter, end portal core, quartus dust recipe
Condenser ore recipes cheaper
Flint to gunpowder recipe gives 3
Fixed crucible inserter not dropping inventory on break
Improved heat providers
Rock crusher/cleaners slower and take more rf/t
Fixed localization of quartz amplification component

2.0.7
Added AE2 (Applied Llamagistics) supportDraconium needs end stone
New recipes for some end tier machines
Fixed dirty certus gem not giving certus
Magma crucible recipes take less power/time nowMachine stats changed (again)
2.0.6Crucible Inserter changed!
Fixed iron freezer gui bug
Guide changes

2.0.5Fixed item and water not being used when cauldron cleaning when no items are obtained from itIncreased percent slightly of dusts from crushed stone/netherrackFixed dirty gems giving more than one when cauldron cleaning...(no more lapis duping)Results destroyed in condenser if output inventory is fullFixed fusion table recipe bugSnow Layer recipe now gives 4 instead of 3Fixed items being lost on occasion when removing machine from the casingAdded Integrated Dynamics support backFixed crucible inserter pipe/duct handlingFixed shrub in guide

2.0.4Changed lead alchemical dust recipeChanged crystal shard recipe to be 1 glass to 2 shardsAdded/changed some guide stuffDirty Gems are now dropped from their respective block type (Stone, netherrack, end stone)

2.0.3Hotfix for crash on servers
2.0.2Rebalance machine variant
Fusion table filter fixed.
Fusion Table gui shows filter when slot is empty
Catalysts improved
Lowered costs of some alchemical items
Fixed typo in condenser guide
Lowered toast display time

2.0.1Fusion recipes for alchemical ore dusts using metal dusts now accept any metal dustBlaze powder recipe lowered to 75 HUDifficult recipe for wood/stone casing changed to avoid conflicts
2.0.0First version of Sky Resources 2 for 1.12!

——————————————————————————————————————mod下载
点我直接去官网下载[url=https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/void-island-control]void island control 下载mod附属 ps：最好用1.12.2版本 毕竟作者以后只会更新1.12.2版本 之前版本已经停更

1.8月27日正式发帖2.8月31日修复格式增加汉化更新部分3.10月4日部分更改汉化更新部分（还是不完善） 增加本帖更新日志

祝大家玩的开心
